intents.description: Query for maximum or minimum number of orders in a date range
examples: What is the maximum number of orders created yesterday?
Show me the max orders created last week
What was the minimum number of orders on January 15th?
How many orders were created at peak time last month?
What's the highest order count in the last 7 days?
Show me the lowest order volume for last week
What was the maximum hourly order count yesterday?
Give me the minimum daily orders for last month
What's the peak order creation time for today?
Show me order statistics for the date range January 1 to January 31
What were the max and min orders created between March 1 and March 15?
How many orders were created per hour yesterday?
Show me daily order counts for last week
What's the order volume trend for the past month?
Give me hourly breakdown of orders for February 5th

intents.description: Query performance metrics for specific components
examples: How is the work order component performing?
Show me performance of the asset component for last week
What's the response time for the inventory component?
Give me performance metrics for the purchase order component
How fast is the work order component responding?
Show me the success rate of the asset component
What's the average response time for the service request component?
Give me performance data for the location component between Jan 1 and Jan 15
How many failed requests does the work order component have?
Show me error rate for the inventory component
What's the p95 response time for the asset component?
Give me performance comparison for work order and asset components
Show me the slowest component in the last 24 hours
What component has the highest error rate?
Give me performance trends for the purchase order component

intents.description: List available components or search for specific components
examples: What components are available?
List all components
Show me all available components
What components can I query?
Give me a list of components
What are the component names?
Show me components related to work orders
List components that contain 'asset'
What inventory components are available?
Show me all purchase order related components
Give me components starting with 'work'
List all service request components
What components are tracked in the system?
Show me the top 10 most queried components
Give me components with the most data

intents.description: Request graph or chart visualization of data
examples: Show me a graph of order trends
Generate a chart for component performance
Create a visualization of response times
Show me a graph of work order performance over time
Generate a chart comparing component response times
Create a heatmap of hourly order volumes
Show me a line graph of daily orders for last month
Generate a bar chart of component success rates
Create a pie chart of error distribution
Show me a time series graph of response times
Generate a visualization of peak hours
Create a graph showing performance trends
Show me a chart of component comparison
Generate a visualization of order patterns
Create a graph of hourly performance metrics

intents.description: Get general statistics for a specific date range
examples: Show me statistics for last week

Give me a summary of last month

What are the numbers for the past 7 days?
Give me metrics for the date range Feb 1 to Feb 10
Show me overall performance for last quarter
What's the summary for this week?
Give me statistics for the past 24 hours
Show me data for the current month
What are the metrics for the last hour?
Give me a breakdown of yesterday's performance
